casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. McCown, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. McCown, 120 Ohio St.3d 323, 2008-Ohio-6252.]

*324(No. 2008-0724 Submitted October 14, 2008 Decided December 9, 2008.) William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Lisa Reitz Williamson, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Kenneth McCown, pro se.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Ferguson, 120 Ohio St.3d 7, 2008-Ohio-4824, 896 N.E.2d 110.

Moyer, C.J., and O’Connor, O’Donnell, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, and Lanzinger, JJ., dissent for the reasons stated in the dissenting opinion of Lanzinger, J., in State v. Ferguson.
